Hi, I'm Aaron Khodami, Ph.D.

Cognitive Scientist & Vision Researcher

More about me View Publications

Research Interests

Driving in Lab

Investigating the mechanisms that allow us to select relevant information from cluttered environments.

Perceptual Learning

Understanding how training and experience shape our visual system and improve performance.

Computational Vision

Building models to simulate human visual processing and predict behavior in complex tasks.

Mathmatical Modeling

Using mathematical models to understand the underlying mechanisms of human perception and cognition.
